message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the product, but I believe I can find something similar for a lower price elsewhere. I would like to counteroffer at $175.
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $175. I can offer you a compromise at $185. This is the lowest I'm willing to go.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $180. This is my best offer given my budget constraints.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go up to $180. I can meet you halfway at $190, which is the best I can do. This is my final offer on this product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget. I would like to counteroffer at $185. This is my best offer based on my current financial situation.

Hi Bob, I'm glad we're still in negotiation. I can see you're serious about this product, and I appreciate that. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll meet you at $187.50. This is my final counteroffer.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your flexibility and understanding. I would like to counteroffer at $186. This is my best offer given my budget constraints.
Hi Bob, I'm starting to think we're getting close. I can see you're really interested in this product, and I appreciate that. I'll meet you at $188. I'm not willing to go any lower than this.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in trying to reach an agreement. I would like to counteroffer at $187. This is my final offer based on my budget constraints.
